scripts.clean-install: npx rimraf package-lock.json && npx rimraf node_modules && npm install
scripts.npmpack-ts: npm run clean-install && npm pack && tar -xvf tagspaces-tagspaces-common-1.3.13.tgz && npx shx cp -rL ./package/** ../../tagspaces/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-platforms/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-common && npx rimraf package
scripts.npmpack-webdav: npm run clean-install && npm pack && tar -xvf tagspaces-tagspaces-common-1.3.13.tgz && npx shx cp -rL ./package/** ../common-webdav/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-common && npx rimraf package
scripts.pkg-publish: npm run clean-install && npm publish --access public
